Detailed Description

Adds a frame to wxExSTC.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

Menu types, they determine how the context menu will appear.

These values extend the menu types used by wxExSTC.

Enumerator:
STC_MENU_TOOL 

for adding tool menu

STC_MENU_REPORT_FIND 

for adding find in files

STC_MENU_REPORT_REPLACE 

for adding replace in files
